sentences.sContent: She was greatly tempted to have a look at it.
sentences.sContent_eng: She was greatly tempted to have a look at it.

sentences.sContent: Today we’ll have a look at a hadron collider of the Nuclear Physics Institute in Novosibirsk.
sentences.sContent_eng: Today we’ll have a look at a hadron collider of the Nuclear Physics Institute in Novosibirsk.
sentences.sCn: 今天让我们来看一看位于新西伯利亚市核物理研究所的强子对撞机。

sentences.sContent: The children really believed that there was a rabbit on the moon. They wanted to go to the moon and have a look one day.
sentences.sContent_eng: The children really believed that there was a rabbit on the moon. They wanted to go to the moon and have a look one day.
sentences.sCn: 这个时候；一些老人会讲述许多古老的故事，如月亮上的玉兔，孩子们信以为真，他们真想有一天登上月球看个究竟。
